content.content: Hello I am new to Maker DAO. My account is showing inactive under DAI section of SourceCred.I already filled the form and provided all the details asked in the form correctly. Can anyone help me to activate it? Or Tell me about the process or requirements to activate it.

Hello, I am also new to here, and recently opted into SourceCred. It took approx. 1-2 month from submitting form of opt in until getting notified. I have opted in at early May and introduced in this Monthly post. https://forum.makerdao.com/t/sourcecred-bi-weekly-happenings-7/15618 and procedure is written in the link on that post.  fill the form get address confirmation DM in this forum replied to DM wait notified by post above  Hope this helps.
And also I can see your name in SourceCred.  Screenshot_20220618-1533491080×2340 166 KB

It’s been around one month but I haven’t received any DM yet and My account is showing inactive. Could you please tell my after how many days of filling form you received DM for confirmation.  IMG_20220618_1859351080×572 52 KB

Rahii:  It’s been around one month but I haven’t received any DM yet and My account is showing inactive.   Looping @sourcecred-trial-adm. Hello @sourcecred-trial-adm, Rahii is trying to be registered in SourceCred, but he/she did not got wallet address confirmation reply from you. Is it possible to provide guide for he/she proceeding the registration? Sorry for disturbing you while you are continuously contributing.     Rahii:  Could you please tell my after how many days of filling form you received DM for confirmation.   Umm, I am not sure because I applied without knowing even SourceCred is active or not currently. I did submit, then forgot completely until I have got DM and referred in post. If you are failed to get reply from somebody doing contribution to SourceCred, I guess submitting form again for double checking that your form had all information (e.g. forum handle for DMing), might change your current status.

Hey Rahii!  Thanks for putting together this post.  The reason why we haven’t activated your account yet is because you haven’t received any likes so far.  We monitor all accounts that opt ​​in to SourceCred on a regular basis and once they receive a like we activate them immediately.  So if you continue participating in the discussion you will be activated shortly.  Please let me know if you have any other questions.
There are almost 7 likes on this post but DAI account is still not activated
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
